TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RuntimeReflectionExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class RuntimeReflectionExtensions abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides methods that retrieve information about types at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethodInfo (this Delegate del);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethodInfo(class System.Delegate del) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function GetMethodInfo (del As Delegate) As MethodInfo
static member GetMethodInfo : Delegate -> System.Reflection.MethodInfo

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the method represented by the specified delegate.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the method.
Docs.exception: The caller does not have access to the method represented by the delegate (for example, if the method is private).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRuntimeBaseDefinition (this System.Reflection.MethodInfo method);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRuntimeBaseDefinition(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo method) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function GetRuntimeBaseDefinition (method As MethodInfo) As MethodInfo
static member GetRuntimeBaseDefinition : System.Reflection.MethodInfo -> System.Reflection.MethodInfo

Docs.param: The method to retrieve information about.
Docs.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the specified method on the direct or indirect base class where the method was first declared.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the specified method's initial declaration on a base class.

Docs.param: The type that contains the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Reflection.EventInfo> GetRuntimeEvents (this Type type);

static member GetRuntimeEvents : Type -> seq<System.Reflection.EventInfo>

Docs.param: The type that contains the events.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a collection that represents all the events defined on a specified type.
Docs.returns: A collection of events for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method returns all events defined on the specified type, including inherited, non-public, instance, and static events.
